content: The Public Health track has two tables on the 3rd floor.

Here is the link to the wiki track
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201809_Public_Health

Here is the link to the Connectathon Managemewnt app
http://conman.fhir.org/connectathon.html?event=baltimore2018

FHIR Server 1: http://eip-fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/hapi-fhir/
FHIR Server 2: http://eip-cds.experimental.aimsplatform.com/hapi-fhir/

BSeR : Referral Requestor : FHIRserver 1
BSeR : Referral Recipient : FHIRServer 2

Cancer Profiles loaded on both servers
BSeR Profiles loaded on Both Servers.

For the reporting scenarios we are using this FHIR server:
https://fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/

The Knowledge Distribution Bundle is located here:
https://fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/baseDstu3/Bundle/1

An example Subscription resource is here
https://fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/baseDstu3/Subscription/53

If you are having issues getting at the above FHIR server, note that registration is required. The instructions are here on the wiki page under Scenarios (Reporting).

After you register, follow the instructions to set your Authorization header.
@Revathy Subramanian

Here is a sample FHIR eICR
https://fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/baseDstu3/Bundle/116

Here is the eICR FHIR ballot
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ecr/2018Sep/

RR CDA posted to server
https://fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/baseDstu3/Binary/118/_history/1
My rest-hook subscription is https://fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/baseDstu3/Subscription/119

To provide an update, I have the Epic subscription client done. I also have the rest-hook endpoint up, and am able to successfully get rest-hook notifications when the value set changes. Tomorrow, I'll work on parsing out the value set, and adding it to our ECR trigger list.

@Rick Geimer

The Structure Definition: https://eip-fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/hapi-fhir/baseDstu3/StructureDefinition/BSeRArthritisRequestSupportBundle

The resource is here https://pastebin.com/735yznQt
eICR example Diagnosis/ICD: https://fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/baseDstu3/Binary/207

eICR example Suspicion posted to FHIR server
https://fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/baseDstu3/Binary/208

Converted FHIR eICR here:
https://fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/baseDstu3/Bundle/209
https://fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/baseDstu3/Binary/210 is the EICR that was triggered using a trigger code that was synced to Epic using the rest-hook subscription process.

And here is the converted FHIR document for Binary/210.
https://fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/baseDstu3/Bundle/211

Social Services and Lifestyle Change Programs EHR Document / Report Creator Roles was able
-Loaded the Profiles on the Sender and Receiver FHIR Servers
-Validated resources involved in ArthiritisReferralRequest
-Created a resource bundle as a Referral Request for ArthiritisReferralRequest.
-Send the Referral to the Referral REcipient as a Transaction bundle

Cancer Registry Reporting IG
-Created Cancer Profile dstu3 on Forge
-Publish profiles to the FHIR servers
-Performed Validations on the Cancer Reporting profile on Forge based .
-Created Extensions for Cancer related Value Sets.
Hi @Rishi Tarar, did you also publish your profiles to Simplifier?
@Michel Rutten Yes they are published. Cancer is in the process, BSeR is on Simplifier.
Great, thanks!
Thread starter for the 2019 January Connectathon in San Antonio

Here is a starter message header for those who want to test messaging in any of the scenarios.
http://hapi.fhir.org/baseDstu3/MessageHeader/1156783
https://eip-fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/hapi-fhir/baseDstu3/Bundle/1
https://pastebin.com/cSnEvW6D
https://eip-fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/hapi-fhir/baseDstu3/Bundle/DiabetesPreventionReferralRequestMessageBundle
https://pastebin.com/uZseWm3p
Latest Paste for Referral https://pastebin.com/w2MqtM3J
https://pastebin.com/QiRy3KP9
https://eip-fhir.experimental.aimsplatform.com/hapi-fhir/baseDstu3/Bundle/DiabetesPreventionReferralFeedbackMessageBundle

eICR FIHR subscription service updates:

  • Reviewed the HAPI code that has been created for distribution of trigger codes
  • Created access to the repository
  • Defined how subscription emails/text can be manged with URL links
  • Added a new requirement for subscription restful service to provide token for remote authentication
@Rick Geimer tbat referral message has a status observation in there with null value codes and descriptions that were for other things. Was that intended, looked wrong to me.

@Brian Postlethwaite The posted bundle was mainly a validation/structural exercise, so I would not read too much into the exact codes. @Rishi Tarar could provide more detail, since he created most of the content.
Connectathon 24 stream for Public Health

Track details:
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-05+Public+Health+Track

And actually it looks like most discussions are going on in the eCR Now Stream
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/236764-eCR-Now.20FHIR.20App
